BASTION.flavor: 棱堡以宙斯盾原型机甲的纯粹防御优势换取更大的机动性。它们将区域抗拒进攻能力与坚固防御系统以及先进通信系统相结合。这些机甲是众多强大中队指挥官的最爱。这种搭配效能在德洛梅达星系（Dromeda system）与虚空之间（Space Between）星际海盗公会的交战中得到了最佳展示，当时一名战地晋升的辅助军官赞德·里夫斯（Zander Reeves）就驾驶着这种机甲。
BASTION.tactics: 棱堡是顽强的防御者，利用自己的机体和大小来保护自己和附近。使用盾墙防御远处的敌人，如炮兵和狙击手。棱堡（和他们的结界）对于击退和强制移动的攻击非常脆弱，因这些效果会破坏他们的许多能力。

Battering Ram.name: 破城槌
Battering Ram.effect: 海军陆战队对一个邻近的地形，障碍物或可展开物品造成 10/20/30 AP 动能伤害。在使用该系统前或后，可移动 2 空间。

BERSERKER.name: 狂战士
BERSERKER.flavor: 狂战士型机甲具备先进热循环系统，该系统能将产生的热量转化为纯粹的进攻力量，从而指数级提升其武器输出。该机甲原型最广为人知的便是达尔·梅洛斯将军（Gen’Dal Merlos）那濒毁的骑士们（Knights of Imminent Destruction），它本身也深受专注于纯粹战斗的组织、私人军事公司（PMC）以及已建立国家中可否认资产部队的青睐。
BERSERKER.tactics: 狂战士是非常优秀的肉搏决斗者，近距离接触时非常可怕。当他们越是尽可能接近敌军，其潜力越大。鉴于他们差劲的热度上限和电子防御，狂战士很容易遭受科技攻击。聪明的对手会利用好斗为自己建立的优势，让狂战士转而对付盟友，所以最好让他们远离友军。

BLAST SHIELD.name: 防爆屏蔽
BLAST SHIELD.effect: 神行客对所有来自线形，锥形，爆发和溅射效果的伤害和热度具有抗性，并且在避免这些效果的所有豁免上+1 准度。

BLINDING SHELLS.name: 致盲弹
BLINDING SHELLS.effect: 在弓箭手成功攻击后迫使目标进行工程豁免。若失败目标下一回合结束前只有邻近空间的视线。

BEST OF THE BEST.name: 精英中的精英
BEST OF THE BEST.effect: 超体无法使用精英或低等兵模板.

BLUR.name: 模糊术
BLUR.effect: 女巫自身回合中，它们隐形。

BOARDING LEASH.name: 跳帮栓链
BOARDING LEASH.on_hit: 目标必须通过机体豁免否则被拉向海盗并自动擒拿。

BODYGUARD.name: 保镖
BODYGUARD.effect: 哨兵选择射程 5 内的盟友角色作为其守护目标并获得自反式打击反应。

BONUS HP.name: HP 加值
BONUS HP.effect: RPV 获得+5 HP——它可以无视可能炸毁驾驶舱并致人死亡的伤害。

BOUNTY HUNTER.name: 赏金猎人
BOUNTY HUNTER.effect: 在战斗开始前，GM 选择一个 PC：他的脑袋会标上赏金。任何雇佣兵在战斗中对驾驶员和机甲的所有攻击、检定和豁免都+1 准度。

BREACHER.name: 破门手
BREACHER.flavor: 坎贝尔轨道动力（Campbell Orbital Dynamics）生产的 C-O Mk III 在登舰行动中以高效著称，它经常出现在亚轨道行星防御部队和海盗部队的军火库中。官方的说法是“CO”是“CombatOrbitital”（战斗轨道）的缩写，但民间调侃 CO3 是个“Can Opener”（开罐器），其灵感来自于最著名的 CO3驾驶员之一瓦莱里娅·罗贾斯-萨尼克（Valeria Rojas-Sarnik）的呼号。
BREACHER.tactics: 破门手可造成可观的爆炸伤害，但他们不是特别精准。为了提高他们的能力，使用锁定或与支援 NPC 配合。破门撞击装置可快速完成掩护工作;然而，它缺乏速度和范围，并有引发反应的风险。

BREACH RAM.name: 破门撞击装置
BREACH RAM.effect: 破门手在一条直线上最多移动 6 空间，忽略交战并穿过但不能停止其他角色占据的空间。破门手路径上的障碍物和物体受到 10/20/30AP 动能伤害。破门手穿过被摧毁的任何障碍物并继续移动，直到移动 6 空间或未能摧毁一个障碍物时停下。任何在破门手路径上的角色必须通过敏捷豁免否则将被尽可能直接地推开并伏卧。

BREAK ARMOR.name: 破甲
BREAK ARMOR.effect: 在一回合内被破门手的双管霰弹枪成功命中超过一次的角色将在剩余场景中离散。

BROAD-SWEEP HAFT.name: 连柄大横扫
BROAD-SWEEP HAFT.effect: 粉碎者以爆发 2 弧度横挥毁灭重锤取代正常攻击。对影响区域内任意角色进行近战攻击。命中则目标受到4/6/8 爆炸伤害并受损直到对方下一回合结束。

Bulky Construction.name: 重型构造
Bulky Construction.effect: 工业机+1 装甲，但推进需完整动作而非快速动作。

BURROWER.name: 掘穴动物
BURROWER.effect: 只要地表有足够延展性，怪形就会在地下挖洞。挖洞时它被视为隐形，可自由穿过角色和其他障碍物所占据的空间；但它只能移动、推进或出现在一个自由空间（作为一个快速动作）。当怪形出现时，它附近的所有角色必须成功进行机体豁免，否则将被伏卧。

Buzzsaw.name: 圆锯
Buzzsaw.effect: 会心一击：该武器基础伤害翻倍。

CAPACITOR DISCHARGE.name: 电容释放
CAPACITOR DISCHARGE.effect: 只要甲胄骑兵未被缓慢或固定，就获得对能量伤害和热度的抗性。在甲胄骑兵回合结束时，所有与之相邻近角色受到 2/3/4 热度。

Captive Spike.name: 捕俘刺
Captive Spike.effect:
海军陆战队将强大的活塞尖刺捅进邻近一个敌方角色，强迫对方进行机体豁免。成功则对方将在下一回合结束前受损。失败则目标会被钉穿，自动被擒拿并直到擒拿结束前都会受损。海军陆战队在擒拿期间缓慢，但不论对方大小，海军陆战队总是视为较大方。要挣脱擒拿，被擒拿方必须以一个完整动作进行机体豁免代替原本的机体对抗检定。

在目标被擒拿期间，任何对海军陆战队进行远程或近战攻击的其他角色必须先掷 1d6：结果为 4+，则该次攻击自动命中被擒拿角色（该效果不与隐形叠加），造成一半的伤害和热度。该效果持续到擒拿结束或海军陆战队再次进行该动作。

CARBON FIBER SWORD.name: 碳纤维剑
CARBON FIBER SWORD.effect:
会心一击：造成+1d6 动能伤害。
T2 时，该武器可一次攻击两次，目标可以是同一个角色，也可以是两个不同角色。T3 时，它可以一次攻击三次。

Centerpiece.effect: 每场战斗最多只能部署一台暴风雨，且无法使用NPC 模板。
Centerpiece.name: 中心装饰品

CARCERI.name: 卡瑟利
CARCERI.effect: 怨恨者在视线感应内对其选择的所有角色使用监禁。

CAREER SOLDIER.name: 职业军人
CAREER SOLDIER.effect: 精英无法获得低等兵或超体模板。

CATAPHRACT.name: 甲胄骑兵
CATAPHRACT.flavor: 甲胄骑兵中队由强调机动性、冲击力和韧性的快速打击机甲组成；因而，全银河系对拥有瞬间冲破防线能力的甲胄骑兵原型机倍感畏惧。没有什么比一支甲胄骑兵中队冲破静止战线重炮点式防御武器阵地，消灭曾不可撼动的防御者更可怕（或更鼓舞人心）了。甲胄骑兵级底盘中的旗舰机是赛德系统公司（Sine Die Systems）的终焉-44，装载着 SDS 可怖撞锤加农炮，一匹棱角分明的野兽。底盘经久不衰地受欢迎可以归因于凯瑟琳“C- 80”·尼德（Catherine “C- 80” Need）的成功，她驾驶终焉-44在卡琳娜近端防御战（the defense of Carina-Proximal）中大获全胜，一战成名。
CATAPHRACT.tactics: 甲胄骑兵是高机动的突击者。践踏允许他们越过敌人到达后方，在那里他们使用钉刺迫使脆弱目标进入不利位置。将甲胄骑兵放置更靠近个体敌方角色位置，单点防御盾无法同距离多目标工作。注意甲胄骑兵移动时仍会引起反应，所以要小心使用他们的能力。

CHAFF.name: 无用之人
CHAFF.effect: 低等兵只有 1HP 并无法获得更多 HP。与其他角色不同的是，他们在成功豁免时从不受到伤害——无论使用的是什么武器或系统——但在其他情况下，他们正常受到伤害。

CHAFF LAUNCHERS.name: 箔条发射器
CHAFF LAUNCHERS.effect: 浪人推进后获得软性掩护直到下一个回合开始。

CHAIN AXE.name: 链斧
CHAIN AXE.effect: 会心一击：目标离散直到对方下一回合结束。

CHAIN.name: 束缚术
CHAIN.effect: 女巫对感应内一个角色进行科技攻击。命中则女巫将目标束缚在射程 3 内位置。弱目标从该点移动超过 3空间（无论自主或强制），将受到 2/3/4 热度并受扰直到对方下一回合结束，然后该效果结束。否则对方会被持续束缚直到女巫被摧毁或晕眩，或场景结束。

CHARGED SLASH.name: 充能斩
CHARGED SLASH.effect: 所有与浪人邻近的角色受到 6/9/12 动能伤害，若通过敏捷豁免则减半。

CHARGE.name: 冲锋
CHARGE.effect: 甲胄骑兵以直线移动等同速度的空间，忽略反应和交战，然后用撞锤加农炮攻击射程内的目标。

CHRONOTORUS.name: 计时环
CHRONOTORUS.effect: 异种致使时间流的局部扭曲。它们可以重掷 1d20，或以反应迫使视线内另一个角色重掷 1d20。必须接受新的结果。
CHRONOTORUS.trigger: 异种或视线中的其他角色进行D20掷骰。

Civilian Machine.name: 民用机甲
Civilian Machine.effect: 工业机豁免和检定+1 难度。科技攻击对工业机+1准度。

CLIMBER.name: 登山者
CLIMBER.effect: 狙击手可以在任何表面（包括悬垂和垂直表面）攀爬并且保持静止不动不受惩罚。

Climate Node.name: 气候节点
Climate Node.effect:
气候节点（大小 2，HP 10/15/20，电子防御 10，回避 10，标签：可展开

在战斗开始时和 PC 部署后，部署与 PC 数量相等的气候节点。它们与玩家部署区或其他气候节点的间距不得超过 10 空间。一旦部署，这些节点就相当于硬性掩护，并对任何来源的移动具有免疫。

位于气候节点射程 3 内的角色可选择获得对来自气象灰浴任意效果的免疫，只要他们维持在射程 3 内。

此外，在每轮结束但纳米体陨石还未迫使敌人或盟友进行豁免前，暴风雨可将一个纳米体陨石溅射区域的中心重定向到气候节点射程 3 内的一个空间。

一旦所有气候节点都被摧毁，所有来自气象灰浴的持续影响立即结束。

CLOAKING FIELD.name: 隐形场
CLOAKING FIELD.effect: 斥候生成爆发 3 的隐形场持续到下一回合结束。受影响区域内的斥候和盟友角色隐形，但斥候在系统激活时固定。

CLOUD PROJECTOR.name: 云投射
CLOUD PROJECTOR.effect: 暗杀者引爆炸药制造出一片烟、霾或其他爆发 3 区域遮盖物。暗杀者在受影响区域内获得软性掩护，完全位于区域内或外除暗杀者之外的角色都无法建立视线进入或离开该区域。部分区域内的角色不受影响。该效果会持续到暗杀者下一回合结束，或直到暗杀者再次使用该系统。

CLUSTER-SEEKER BOMBS.name: 集群引导炸弹
CLUSTER-SEEKER BOMBS.effect: 射石加农炮在所选目标空间射程 3 内的三个角色受到 2/3/4 爆炸伤害，无论命中与否。

CLUSTER MUNITIONS.name: 集束弹药
CLUSTER MUNITIONS.effect: 投弹者的攻击对第一个以外所有目标造成+2/+3/+4 伤害。

COMMANDER.name: 指挥官
COMMANDER.description: 指挥官在大规模战役中运转，在天体和星际太空操控舰队和军队。他们可能不是最致命的士兵，但他们能激发出军队中最好的一面。

COMMANDER TRAITS.name: 指挥官特征
COMMANDER TRAITS.effect: 指挥官从指挥官特征表中选择其一。若指挥官受扰，则该特征不受用。

Composite Armor.name: 复合装甲
Composite Armor.effect: 主战坦克一侧是装甲面（选择其指示物/图标/微缩模型一侧，参考右侧图示）。所有角色均可辨明其朝向。任何攻击和效果，若其效果线直接对准装甲面，则视主战坦克拥有 6 装甲，且对溅射、爆发、线形和锥形的伤害及效果获得抗性。自装甲面受到的 AP 伤害、燃烧和以及主战坦克在离散状态下承受的任何伤害仍会减少2。地雷和其他基于邻近的系统不受此特征影响。每当主战坦克标准移动或推进时，可改变其装甲面的朝向。

CONCUSSION MISSILES.name: 震荡导弹
CONCUSSION MISSILES.effect: 视线射程 5 内粉碎者所选的任意角色必须通过机体豁免否则缓慢和受损直到对方下一回合结束。

Construction Tools.name: 施工工具
Construction Tools.effect: 工业者可从工业机武器列表中选择一件武器。他们可以选择第二件武器，但如此行事必须与其一件基本武器互相替换。

COOLING MODULE.name: 冷却模块
COOLING MODULE.effect: 在清扫器回合开始时，若它们在上一回合结束后没有移动包括强制移动，则清扫器清除所有热度。

Coordinated Carnage.name: 协同残杀
Coordinated Carnage.effect: 所有特种部队在该轮中执行回合后，单个特种部队角色可按照通常回合顺位额外进行一个回合。

COREWORM ROCKETS.name: 核虫火箭
COREWORM ROCKETS.effect:
1d3 微型无人机附着在视线射程 10 内的一个角色身上，并开始钻进目标驾驶舱。在 1d3+2 轮，若有任何核虫仍附着，那么它们会抵达驾驶舱并狠揍一顿驾驶员，降低他们的 HP 到 0。目标知晓无人机需要工作多少轮，以及还有多少附着。
目标和邻近盟友角色可以用一个快速动作在系统或工程检定成功下移除一架无人机。此外，若目标关机，核虫会陷入困惑，它们的轮次倒计时会暂停。

CORROSIVE BITE.name: 腐蚀啮咬
CORROSIVE BITE.effect: 与怪形邻近的角色必须通过机体豁免否则将受到4/5/6 燃烧伤害。成功与否都会离散直到对方恢复任意HP。

COVERING FIRE.name: 覆盖火力
COVERING FIRE.effect: 弓箭手在视线射程 10 内选择溅射 3 区域，并获得逮住你了反应。

CQB TRAINING.name: CQB特训
CQB TRAINING.effect: 神行客免疫缓慢且不能被擒拿。

CREW.name: 机组
CREW.effect: 若载具大于大小 1/2，则它可能有1个机组；若是如此，它的机组成员数量至少是它大小的一半。

CRUSHING EMBRACE.name: 粉碎性拥抱
CRUSHING EMBRACE.effect: 邻近歌利亚的角色必须通过敏捷豁免否则自动被歌利亚擒拿并受扰，直到不再擒拿为止。歌利亚一次只能以该方式擒拿一个角色。

DARK CLOUD.name: 暗云
DARK CLOUD.effect: 如果目标在超温危域，则拆毁术的额外热度伤害在女巫下一回合开始时增加到 7 热度。

DATAVEIL.name: 数据面纱
DATAVEIL.effect: 默认斥候处于隐形并可用快速动作将此状态转移视线内另一角色。斥候不再隐形，只有以快速动作将其转移回或转移至另一角色斥候才恢复状态；否则此效果将持续到斥候被摧毁。

Deadly Precision.name: 致命精准
Deadly Precision.effect: 特种部队在会心一击时造成+2/+3/+3 额外伤害。

DEADMETAL ROUNDS.name: 死亡金属轮
DEADMETAL ROUNDS.effect: 狙击手为反器材步枪填装一种特殊的过穿透力子弹：下一次攻击变为线形 20。

DEATHCOUNTER.name: 死亡抗拒
DEATHCOUNTER.effect: 每轮棱堡第一次被远程或近战攻击成功命中所有伤害降为 0。

Deck Anchors.name: 甲板锚
Deck Anchors.effect: 海军陆战队忽略该移动。
Deck Anchors.trigger: 海军陆战队被其他角色攻击或在被迫进行豁免中失败而强制移动。上述效果中不包括瞬间移动。

DEFENSE NET.name: 防御网
DEFENSE NET.effect:
宙斯盾会在爆发 3 内散布一面强大辉煌的斥力护盾。激活时，宙斯盾固定，但所有受影响区域内的角色或物品遭到来自区域外的远程、近战和科技攻击则+2难度，且不会被会心一击。受影响区域内的角色可正常攻击该区域内外的角色。
受影响区域内盟友角色也获得对受损和缓慢的免疫，当进入该区域且已身负这些状态则立即移除它们。
该效果持续到宙斯盾协定结束，或自身晕眩、受扰或被摧毁。非自主移动会导致护盾随宙斯盾一起移动。

DEFENSIVE GRAPPLE.name: 防御性抓钩
DEFENSIVE GRAPPLE.effect: 狙击手可以用抓钩将自己拉到射程 5 以内的任何地点，如同飞行。狙击手同时获得重新定位反应。

DEFENSIVE PULSE.name: 防御性脉冲
DEFENSIVE PULSE.effect: 射程 3 内的所有盟友角色清除受扰与锁定。

DEMOLISHER.tactics: 粉碎者是缓慢而坚韧的卫兵，当他们与敌人接近时会给予大量伤害并晕眩。在近战中使用他们的大小和力量迫使敌人角色移动离开而不是与他们战斗，然后使用挖壕固守抵御重击。
DEMOLISHER.name: 粉碎者
DEMOLISHER.flavor: 对贾迪戈莫拉城（Jadigmora City）漫长的围攻，见证了第一台真正粉碎者骨架的诞生。基于老式狂战士机甲，粉碎者用更持久的系统取代了戏剧性热流系统，改进了液压强度以及超大规模近战武器稳定器。粉碎者驾驶员很快发现了震波武器的一系列新用途。名为海耶斯·罗斯福德（Hayes Rothford）的枪骑兵同他的 NHP 克拉克（Clarke），是第一位真正展示了该平台力量的驾驶员/副驾驶员团队，他们单枪匹马在低轨道击落了一艘攻城护卫舰。

DEMOLITION HAMMER.name: 毁灭重锤
DEMOLITION HAMMER.on_hit: 目标必须通过机体豁免否则晕眩直到对方下一回合结束。

DEPLOYABLE TURRET.name: 可部署炮塔
DEPLOYABLE TURRET.effect:
可部署炮塔（大小 1/2，HP5/8/10，回避 10，电子防御 10，标签：无人机）
这些自我建构炮塔可部署到任何邻近的自由空间。在工程师回合，部署炮塔会攻击射程 10 内最近的敌方角色。攻击+1/+2/+3，伤害 4/5/6 动能伤害。工程师最多同时拥有 6 台已部署炮塔，若工程师被摧毁，所有炮塔均失效。

DEVOURING SHARD.name: 吞噬碎片
DEVOURING SHARD.effect: 在护罩区域内，潜伏者可用快速动作以雷霆之势喷出锥形 3剃刀般锋利的纳米体洪流。受影响区域内的角色必须通过工程豁免否则受到 4/5/6AP 能量伤害。成功则伤害减半。

Diffusor.name: 扩散器
Diffusor.effect:
触发：一个敌对角色在暴风雨射程 3 内开始回合，或在其回合中首次与暴风雨邻近。

效果：目标必须通过系统豁免，否则无法以任何方式恢复 HP，直到它们承受结构或压力伤害。

DIG IN.name: 掘壕固守
DIG IN.effect: 获得对所有攻击伤害的抗性，但缓慢直到自己下一回合结束。
DIG IN.trigger: 一次攻击命中粉碎者，但伤害还未掷出。

DRAIN SYSTEMS.name: 枯竭系统
DRAIN SYSTEMS.effect: 幽鬼对邻近角色进行科技攻击。成功则目标晕眩。此效果持续到除幽鬼外其他角色开始回合与目标邻近或移动到目标邻近。

DRIVING SWARM.name: 倾泻蜂群
DRIVING SWARM.effect: 角色受到剃刀蜂群燃烧伤害时必须通过系统豁免，否则在受到伤害后立即向蜂巢所选方向移动 4 空间。该移动忽略交战和反应。

DISCIPLINED.name: 纪律
DISCIPLINED.effect: 失去 HP 不会影响班组每回合的攻击次数。

DUAL SHOTGUNS.name: 鼓轮霰弹枪
DUAL SHOTGUNS.effect: 该武器可一次攻击两次，目标可以是同一个角色，也可以是两个不同角色。

DUCK AND COVER.name: 卧倒藏好
DUCK AND COVER.effect: 班组获得伤害抗性，但固定直到下一回合结束。

EARTHSHAKER SHELLS.name: 撼地炮弹
EARTHSHAKER SHELLS.effect: 用射石加农炮攻击时，投弹者也可以发射一枚特殊的震地炮弹。除了造成伤害外，距离目标空间爆发 3 以内的角色必须通过机体豁免否则伏卧。碎片或破碎的泥土被撞击抛起，在投弹者选择的自由空间内（受影响区域内）制造 2 个大小 1 的硬性掩护。

ECHO EDGE.name: 共鸣锋刃
ECHO EDGE.effect: 被浪人伤害的角色将获得一个浪人标记。浪人回合开始时可用一个自由动作清除所有浪人标记，自动对所有浪人标记角色造成 1d6AP 动能伤害并清除标记。

EMERGENCY VENT.name: 紧急通风口
EMERGENCY VENT.effect: 当清扫器超过其热度上限或被晕眩时，它们隐形直到下一回合开始。

ELITE.name: 精英
ELITE.description: 精英敌人比大多数敌人更强大——仅次于超体。他们可能是特别坚韧或经验丰富的驾驶员，特种部队，或使用比普通士兵更高水平技术或更好的装备的敌人。精英们可以在每轮行动几次并获得额外结构，这将高效地使他们的 HP 加倍，并允许他们像 PC 一样进行结构伤害检定。

EMPOWERED CLOUD.name: 附魔云
EMPOWERED CLOUD.effect: 若盟友角色开始其回合时与支援者邻近，他们可以清除一个状态。

EMPOWER SHROUD.name: 天命护罩
EMPOWER SHROUD.effect: 潜伏者将他们目前占据的某护罩区域扩展到爆发 2。这可能致使它囊括其他角色。从现在起需两次成功攻击才能驱散效果。

ENDLESS REVENGE.name: 无尽复仇
ENDLESS REVENGE.effect: 复仇在每场景中可被触发任意次数，但在第一次触发后，它就不能获得额外伤害提升。取而代之的是它给予+4/5/6 护盾。这不会取代原先的护盾，而是增加相同的量。

ERUPTING SHRAPNEL.name: 迸发簇弹
ERUPTING SHRAPNEL.effect: 当复仇者的攻击伤害到另一角色时，他们可以迫使该角色通过工程豁免，否则将被爆破簇弹覆盖直到他们下一回合结束。在该效果解除前，他们每次进行近战或远程攻击时都会受到3/4/5AP 爆炸伤害。受影响角色会意识到这种效果。

EVASIVE.name: 规避
EVASIVE.effect: 超体获得+4 回避（最高 20）和-1 结构。

EXPLOSIVE VENT.name: 爆炸性通风
EXPLOSIVE VENT.effect: 纵火狂清除所有热量。爆发 1 内的角色必须通过敏捷豁免否则受到等同纵火狂清除量一半的热度并伏卧。

EXPOSE WEAKNESS.name: 暴露弱点
EXPOSE WEAKNESS.effect: 成功被标记步枪攻击的角色下次成功被远程或近战攻击时受到+4/+6/+8 额外伤害。若它没被触发，则持续到场景结束。

EXTENDED BLADE.name: 加长刀刃
EXTENDED BLADE.effect: 浪人的碳纤维剑变为威胁 3。当浪人每回合首次用它进行会心一击时，威胁内的所有角色都将受到 2/3/4动能伤害——包括目标。

EXTRA DEADLY.name: 额外致命
EXTRA DEADLY.effect: 超体每回合首次会心一击在 T2 造成+2d6 伤害，或在 T3 造成+3d6 伤害。

EXTRUDITE.name: 挤压出物
EXTRUDITE.effect: 路障使用便携打印机一次可以打印两个独立立方体而非一个。

EYE OF MIDNIGHT.name: 子夜之眼
EYE OF MIDNIGHT.effect: 哨兵缓慢，但守望的 1/回合取代 1/轮。一旦激活，该效果将一直持续到以快速动作终止。

Eye of the Storm.name: 暴风眼
Eye of the Storm.effect: 暴风雨可选择对其气象灰浴的任何效果具有免疫。此外，当它被摧毁或暴露时，它可摧毁一个气候节点作为替代来清除暴露和所有热度，并恢复到一半 HP。

FEARLESS DEFENDER.name: 无畏捍卫者
FEARLESS DEFENDER.effect: 效果：棱堡可以移动到邻近空间并承受伤害。
FEARLESS DEFENDER.trigger: 触发：棱堡射程 5 内的一个盟友受到伤害，同时棱堡没被固定，缓慢，晕眩或其他不能移动的方式。

FLASH LENS.name: 闪光镜头
FLASH LENS.effect: 以清扫器为原点的锥形 5 内所有角色必须通过系统豁免否则受扰直到清扫器下一回合开始。

FLECHETTE SHOT.name: FLECHETTE SHOT
FLECHETTE SHOT.effect: Attacks with this weapon take the form of a Cone 3 shrapnel attack starting from the edge of the targeted space, attacking all characters within both the targeted space and the affected area. The Cone cannot change directions.

Flying Platform.name: Flying Platform
Flying Platform.effect: The Tempest moves normally in zero-g environments. In-atmosphere, it always hovers at a height of 4 spaces, gains Immunity to Immobilized, and does not fall as a result of being Stunned.Due to its Size, the Tempest cannot become Hidden or gain hard cover from objects.

FOCUS DOWN.name: FOCUS DOWN
FOCUS DOWN.effect: When the Scourer hits with the Thermal Lance, targets take {5/7/8} Burn if they were also successfully hit with the Thermal Lance in the previous round.

GRAVITON LANCE.name: GRAVITON LANCE
GRAVITON LANCE.effect: At T2–3, this weapon can make two attacks at once, hitting one character twice or two characters once.
GRAVITON LANCE.on_hit: Target is Slowed until the end of their next turn.

GRAV SPIKE.name: GRAV SPIKE
GRAV SPIKE.effect: A character within line of sight and range 5 must succeed on a Systems save, or a grav spike attaches itself to them. The Seeder can detonate all grav spikes as a protocol, causing targets to automatically take {4/6/8} AP Explosive damage and be pulled 3 spaces in a direction chosen by the Seeder. A quick action and passed Systems save removes a grav spike.

Graywash Manipulation.name: Graywash Manipulation
Graywash Manipulation.effect: Upon activation the Tempest may apply another environmental condition from Meteorological Graywash that lasts until dispersed or ended by Tempest.

GREATER INVESTITURE.name: GREATER INVESTITURE
GREATER INVESTITURE.effect: Investiture gives its target Resistance to all damage, but the Priest becomes Immobilized while linked.

GRIND MANIPLE.name: GRIND MANIPLE
GRIND MANIPLE.effect: The Hive releases a swarm of tiny, hard to hit drones that make a tech attack against a hostile character within Sensors and line of sight. On hit, the drones clamp on, causing them to take 2 Burn each time they take any action or reaction until the end of their next turn.

GRUNT.name: 低等兵
GRUNT.description: Grunts are a step above cannon fodder. They typically take to the field in mass-produced or stock mechs—trained for discipline rather than excellence. Grunts may not be threats on their own, but in a group, they become an overwhelming mass of bodies and projectiles that threatens even the most powerful enemies.

GUARDIAN.name: GUARDIAN
GUARDIAN.effect: Allied characters can use the Bastion for hard cover.

HACKER.name: HACKER
HACKER.effect: The Veteran deals +2 heat on successful tech attacks.

HEATED BLADE.name: HEATED BLADE
HEATED BLADE.effect: Deals double damage to Prone, Shredded, Immobilized, or Stunned targets.

HEAVY FRAME.name: HEAVY FRAME
HEAVY FRAME.effect: The Goliath can’t be pushed, pulled, knocked Prone, or knocked back by smaller characters.

HELLFIRE PROJECTOR.name: HELLFIRE PROJECTOR
HELLFIRE PROJECTOR.effect: This weapon can make two attacks at a time, but the area of the two attacks can’t overlap.

Helodbella Doctrine Upgrade II.name: Helodbella Doctrine Upgrade II
Helodbella Doctrine Upgrade II.effect: Hostile characters takes 1/2/3 heat each time they make an attack roll while Grappled by the Leech.

HOVER PROPULSION.name: HOVER PROPULSION
HOVER PROPULSION.effect: The Ultra can hover when they move or Boost.

Hover Tank.name: Hover Tank
Hover Tank.effect: The MBT ignores dangerous terrain, and its standard move no longer needs to be in a straight line.

HUMAN.name: 人类
HUMAN.flavor:
All kinds of people end up on the battlefield, including pilots, VIPs, and bystanders.
You will mostly use Human NPCs when someone climbs out of their mech mid-battle; if you want a proper group of infantry, use the Squad class instead. Humans can never take other templates, and cannot gain structure.

HUNTER-KILLER NEXUS.name: HUNTER-KILLER NEXUS
HUNTER-KILLER NEXUS.effect: At T2, this weapon can make two attacks at a time, targeting either the same character or two different ones. At T3, it can make three attacks at a time.

HUNTSMAN.name: HUNTSMAN
HUNTSMAN.effect: Against characters with Lock On, the Rainmaker’s weapons gain Smart, Seeking, and AP.

HUNT.name: HUNT
HUNT.effect: The Specter’s melee attacks deal +5 damage when no other characters are adjacent to their target.

HUSTLE.name: HUSTLE
HUSTLE.effect: When the Strider swaps kits, they can move spaces equal to their SPEED as a free action.

ILLUSORY SUBROUTINES.name: ILLUSORY SUBROUTINES
ILLUSORY SUBROUTINES.effect: The Mirage makes a tech attack against a target within Sensors. On a success, the target treats all characters allied to the Mirage as Invisible until the start of their next turn.

Illusory Nodes.name: Illusory Nodes
Illusory Nodes.effect: All climate nodes within SENSORS and line of sight become INVISIBLE until the end of the next round.

IMPALER.name: IMPALER
IMPALER.effect: When the Sentinel hits with Overwatch, their target must pass a Hull save or become Immobilized and Jammed until the end of their next turn.

Industrial.name: Industrial
Industrial.description: Civilian machines built for mining and construction are much more numerous in the galaxy than those purpose-built for combat. Despite their obvious shortcomings, those with little alternatives will often pilot these chassis into battle, turning tools meant to create into tools used to destroy.

INFECTIOUS REVENGE.name: INFECTIOUS REVENGE
INFECTIOUS REVENGE.effect: When REVENGE triggers, all allied characters within Range 5 – excluding the Avenger – gain OVERSHIELD +{4/6/8}.

INSIDIOUS PRISON.name: INSIDIOUS PRISON
INSIDIOUS PRISON.effect: Characters affected by IMPRISON take {5/7/9} Energy AP immediately after they OVERCHARGE . They are aware of this effect, and this damage cannot be prevented or reduced in any way.

INSTINCT MODE.name: INSTINCT MODE
INSTINCT MODE.effect: Until the end of the Ronin’s next turn, the first time each turn that they are targeted by an attack, the Ronin may first use the Carbon Fiber Sword to attack a character within Range as a reaction.

INSULATED.name: INSULATED
INSULATED.effect: The Veteran gains Immunity to Burn.

JAVELIN ROCKETS.name: JAVELIN ROCKETS
JAVELIN ROCKETS.effect:
The Rainmaker chooses 3 free spaces within line of sight and range 20 that are not adjacent to each other. All characters know which spaces have been chosen. The Rainmaker fires a volley of auto-targeting rockets into the air: the next time a hostile character moves through, starts their turn in, or passes above one of the chosen spaces – no more than 10 spaces up – they are hit by a rocket, taking {5/6/7} kinetic damage. Each space can only be triggered once.
This effect lasts until the start of the Rainmaker’s next turn.

Jump Packs.name: Jump Packs
Jump Packs.effect: The Spec Ops can fly whenever it Boosts. It must end this movement on a solid surface or begin falling.

KAI BIOPLATING.name: KAI BIOPLATING
KAI BIOPLATING.effect: The Assassin gains +1 Accuracy on all Agility checks; additionally, they climb and swim at normal speed, ignore difficult terrain, and, when making a standard move, can jump horizontally up to their Speed and vertically up to half their Speed (in any combination).

LEGENDARY.name: LEGENDARY
LEGENDARY.effect: The Veteran rolls all structure damage and overheating checks twice and chooses either result.

LEGION.name: LEGION
LEGION.effect: The Ultra gains +4 E-Defense (to a maximum of 20) and +1 Accuracy on all tech attacks.

LESSER SIGHT.name: LESSER SIGHT
LESSER SIGHT.effect: The Veteran ignores Invisible for characters within range 3, and hostile characters in range 3 can’t Hide successfully (though they remain Hidden if they were already).

Lightning Generator.name: Lightning Generator
Lightning Generator.effect: The Tempest chooses up to two hostile characters within RANGE 5: they must both succeed on SYSTEMS saves or take 2/3/4 heat and become JAMMED until the end of their next turn.

LIMITED MELEE.name: LIMITED MELEE
LIMITED MELEE.effect: The Vehicle can’t make melee attacks other than Ram.

MACHINE PISTOL.name: MACHINE PISTOL
MACHINE PISTOL.effect: At T2, this weapon can make two attacks at a time, targeting either the same character or two different ones. At T3, it can make three attacks at a time.

Maneuverable.name: Maneuverable
Maneuverable.effect: The Marine moves normally in zero-g.

MARINE.name: 海军陆战队
MARINE.description: Naval boarding and counterboarding actions are among some of the most dangerous operations that pilots can undertake in some of the most treacherous environments imaginable, with high casualty rates on both sides being both expected and accepted by the commanders who order these soldiers to undertake assaults against ships and stations or against those who seek to take them. Marine pilots know that preparedness is the key to survival, and outfit their chassis accordingly with additional up-armoring, breaching equipment, and close-quarters engagement tools to help tip the odds in their favor when the hullcutter charges blow.

Marine Systems.name: Marine Systems
Marine Systems.effect: When choosing optional systems, the Marine can also choose from the Marine Systems and Traits list.

MARKER RIFLE.name: MARKER RIFLE
MARKER RIFLE.on_hit: Target receives Lock On. For as long as they have Lock On, they are also Shredded, and can’t Hide or become Invisible.

Marker Nexus.name: Marker Nexus
Marker Nexus.on_hit: The target must pass a Systems save or gain Lock On and become Impaired until the end of their next turn.

MARKSMAN KIT SWAP BONUS.name: MARKSMAN KIT SWAP BONUS
MARKSMAN KIT SWAP BONUS.effect: Swap bonus: This turn only, damage from the RANGER LONG RIFLE cannot be reduced in any way and it ignores the ORDNANCE tag.
MARKSMAN KIT SWAP BONUS.trigger: The Strider swaps to the MARKSMAN KIT.

MASSIVE SIZE.name: MASSIVE SIZE
MASSIVE SIZE.effect: The Ship is Size 4. Though it is larger than most mechs, it is small by ship standards; larger ships are too heavily armored to be damaged by mech-scale weapons.

MELT.name: MELT
MELT.effect: The Scourer makes a ranged attack against an object, deployable or Drone within Range 10, dealing 20 AP Energy damage on a success.

MIMIC MESH.name: MIMIC MESH
MIMIC MESH.effect: The Avenger may move 3 spaces directly toward the attacker.
MIMIC MESH.trigger: An allied non-Grunt, non-Drone character within Range 5 fails a save or is hit by an attack from a hostile character to which the Avenger has line of sight.

MONSTROSITY.name: 怪形
MONSTROSITY.flavor: Monstrosities are especially large or horrifying natural predators. Although they are usually wild, some monstrosities can be domesticated and trained for combat: such creatures are in high demand along the furthest reaches of the galaxy.

MOTILE SWARM.name: MOTILE SWARM
MOTILE SWARM.effect: At the start of the Hive’s turn, they may move all razor swarms up to 2 spaces in any direction, including into spaces occupied by other characters.

Nanite Manipulation.name: Nanite Manipulation
Nanite Manipulation.effect: The Tempest may activate another graywash effect from METEOROLOGICAL GRAYWASH. It lasts until ended by the destruction of a Climate Node or ended by Tempest. It does not have to choose from the list of readied graywash effects and does not have to follow the category escalation but still must take the heat required to sustain the effect.

Nanite Metafold Transferal.name: Nanite Metafold Transferal
Nanite Metafold Transferal.effect: The Tempest may teleport any allied character within RANGE 3 of a Climate Node to a free space within RANGE 3 of another node.

NO MANIPULATORS.name: NO MANIPULATORS
NO MANIPULATORS.effect: The Ship can’t pick up objects, manipulate objects or the environment, or Grapple.

Nanite Meteor.name: Nanite Meteor
Nanite Meteor.effect: The Tempest may end any active graywash effects to create a number of Blast 2 areas equal to the number of graywash effects ended this way. The Tempest may only have three Blast 2 areas on the map at a time and these areas cannot overlap and last until the end of the next round. At the end of the next round any characters partially or wholly within one of the affected areas must pass an Agility save or take 14/16/18 Kinetic Damage. On a success, they take half damage.After activation, the Tempest clears all heat.

NO PILOT.name: NO PILOT
NO PILOT.effect: The RPV has Immunity to any systems or actions that affect a pilot directly; however, it is also permanently Impaired, unable to make complex decisions or moral judgments.

Operatives.name: Operatives
Operatives.effect: When choosing optional systems and traits, the Spec Ops can also choose from the Spec Ops Systems and Traits list. Additionally, the Spec Ops can’t take the Grunt, Elite, or Ultra templates.

OPERATOR.name: 操作员
OPERATOR.flavor: Operators are known-unknowns, rarely encountered on the front lines, but this should not be mistaken for fragility. Operators are dangerous and deadly in every way. Like their mechs, Operators’ bodies are loaded with the most advanced tech available. When they die in combat, it’s not unknown for their bodies – and their mechs — to self-immolate, rendering any technology and data into ash.
OPERATOR.tactics: Operators are elite and extremely mobile artillery mechs. They aren’t particularly hardy, but can use Trace Drive to teleport around the battlefield and put themselves in advantageous positions: on top of obstructions or terrain, or in cover – anywhere they can snipe at enemies with their highly accurate Raptor Plasma Rifles.

Null-Perception Coating.name: Null-Perception Coating
Null-Perception Coating.effect: The Spec Ops gains Immunity to Lock On.

OFFENSIVE WEAPON SWAP.name: OFFENSIVE WEAPON SWAP
OFFENSIVE WEAPON SWAP.effect: When the Strider uses SWAP KIT, they may deal 2 Kinetic damage to an adjacent hostile character. The affected character must also pass an AGILITY save or be knocked 3 spaces back and knocked PRONE.

Ophiocordyceps Doctrine Upgrade I.name: Ophiocordyceps Doctrine Upgrade I
Ophiocordyceps Doctrine Upgrade I.effect:
While Grappling, the Leech picks two options:

Push the Grappled character 4 spaces in any direction.

Inflict Impaired on the character it is Grappling or another target within range 3 of them.

Deal 3/4/5 AP energy damage to the character it is Grappling or another target within range 3 of them.

PAIN TRANSFERENCE.name: PAIN TRANSFERENCE
PAIN TRANSFERENCE.effect: The Witch makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a success, any time the target gains heat until the end of the Witch’s next turn, all of their allied characters within range 5 also gain the same amount of heat.

PARACAUSAL WEAPON.name: PARACAUSAL WEAPON
PARACAUSAL WEAPON.effect: Choose one of the Exotic’s weapons. Damage from that weapon can’t be reduced in any way – by Armor, Resistance, or otherwise.

PETRIFY.name: PETRIFY
PETRIFY.effect: The Witch makes a tech attack against a character within Sensors. On a success, the target becomes Slowed. On their next turn, they also become Immobilized. On their following turn, they also become Stunned. All conditions end at the end of that turn.

Phase-Shift Generator.name: Phase-Shift Generator
Phase-Shift Generator.effect: As a protocol, the Horror may become Intangible until the start of their next turn. Alternatively they may clear Intangible. The Horror may not become Intangible if they used this system on their last turn.

Point-defence Turret.name: Point-defence Turret
Point-defence Turret.on_hit: 1/round as a reaction, the Tempest may use this weapon to attack a character who enters RANGE 3 of a Climate Node, drawing line of sight from the node. It may also attack and overwatch normally with this weapon as if it were drawing line of sight from a Climate Node..

Pointman Plating.name: Pointman Plating
Pointman Plating.effect: The Marine gains the Guardian trait if they do not already have it (adjacent allies can use the Marine as hard cover). If they already have the Guardian trait, then Guardian now additionally grants soft cover to all adjacent allies from all directions.

PRESS ON!.name: PRESS ON!
PRESS ON!.effect: The Commander clears either the Stunned condition or the Jammed condition currently affecting an allied character within line of sight.

PRESS THE ATTACK.name: PRESS THE ATTACK
PRESS THE ATTACK.effect: The Commander can attack the target, and deals half damage, heat or Burn if successful.
PRESS THE ATTACK.trigger: A target damages an allied character.

PRIEST.name: 司铎
PRIEST.flavor: Priest-archetype mechs are found among the ranks of technozealot cults, transhumanist movements, and states or corporations that prioritize technological supremacy. These frames are configured to network their sensitive core systems with sympathetic mechs, creating digital super-constructs in order to establish and maintain total theater control. The use of Priest-archetype chassis and strategies were pioneered by a small, esoteric group known as the Messengers of MAIA. Ostensibly a courier group, the Messengers push all systems – synthetic and organic – to their theoretical limits. They even go so far as to share sensory input between linked pilots – an experience known to produce hyper-perception fugues and other ascendant mental states.
PRIEST.tactics: Priests are powerful support mechs that function best when partnered with another character they can empower with Investiture. Use their Dispersal Shield to protect vulnerable targets and Investiture to empower an allied striker or defender. Enemies can disarm Investiture by separating Priests from their partners, at which point both become vulnerable to conditions.

PRIMARY WEAPON.name: PRIMARY WEAPON
PRIMARY WEAPON.effect: This weapon can make two attacks at a time; if the Squad loses more than half its HP, it can only make one attack at a time.

PROWL.name: PROWL
PROWL.effect: The Specter moves spaces equal to Speed, then becomes Hidden. This movement ignores engagement and doesn’t provoke reactions.

PRYING CLAWS.name: PRYING CLAWS
PRYING CLAWS.effect: The Pirate attempts to pry open the cockpit of a character adjacent to them. The target must succeed on a Hull save or the pilot is forced to immediately exit their mech as though Dismounting.

Purge.name: Purge
Purge.effect:
The Leech picks up to two of the following:

End a condition affecting the character is Grappling, as long as it wasn’t caused by that character’s own systems, weapons, traits, or talents.

The Grappled character loses all overshield

Either the Grappled character or the Leech gains Overshield 5/6/7

PYRO.name: 纵火狂
PYRO.flavor: First popularized in the wake of the Hercynian Crisis by the lancer Flama and their aptly named Devil Corps, Pyro frames are reviled across the galaxy as the embodiment of the pure destructive power held by militarized states and corpro-states. Their use is common within organizations for which the ends justify the means. Pyros are well-armored, and better insulated than most chassis of similar gross weight, designed to manage incredible internal heat while projecting volatile mixes of chemicals and flame toward their enemies. Pyros are often used in urban and jungle warfare, where they can be used to root out entrenched defenders.
PYRO.tactics: Pyros are slow, resilient mechs that are especially potent against characters already suffering from Burn. If players don’t keep their distance, Pyros can use Explosive Vent to dump an enormous amount of heat on right on them. Position Pyros so they can protect allies against incoming fire with Firebreak Shield. Note, however, that players can move around shields to reduce their effectiveness to zero, or they can deactivate them by hitting Pyros with Stunned or Knockback weapons.

RAM CANNON.name: RAM CANNON
RAM CANNON.effect: This lance can be used as either a ranged or melee weapon, but not both in the same turn. At T2–3, this weapon can make two attacks at a time, targeting either the same character or two different ones.

RANGER LONG RIFLE.name: RANGER LONG RIFLE
RANGER LONG RIFLE.effect: This weapon deals 9/10/12 Kinetic instead of its standard damage if the target is further than Range 8.

RANK AND FILE.name: RANK AND FILE
RANK AND FILE.effect: The Squad can’t take the Grunt, Veteran, or Ultra templates, and can never gain Structure.

RANK DISCIPLINE.name: RANK DISCIPLINE
RANK DISCIPLINE.effect: The Assault gains +1 Accuracy on all attacks, checks, and saves while adjacent to at least one allied character with the Mech tag.

RAPID INSERTION.name: RAPID INSERTION
RAPID INSERTION.effect: The Squad may fly whenever it moves or Boosts.

RAPID RESPONSE.name: RAPID RESPONSE
RAPID RESPONSE.trigger: An enemy character in line of sight moves.

REBOUND.name: REBOUND
REBOUND.effect: They roll 1d6: on 4+, they gain Resistance to damage from that attack, and the attacker must repeat the attack against themselves.
REBOUND.trigger: The Ronin takes damage from a ranged attack.

REALITY FLICKER.name: REALITY FLICKER
REALITY FLICKER.effect: The Mirage teleports when they make a standard move.

REBOUND SCAN.name: REBOUND SCAN
REBOUND SCAN.effect: All characters of the Scout’s choice within range 5 must make a Systems save. On a failure, they immediately lose Hidden and Invisible, and can’t regain either status or benefit from any cover until the start of the Scout’s next turn.

Redirect.name: Redirect
Redirect.effect:
Trigger: A Climate Node within SENSORS and line of sight is hit by a ranged attack.

Effect: After damage is dealt, the Tempest may force a hostile character within RANGE 3 of the node to pass an AGILITY save or take half the damage dealt to the node.

REFLEXIVE BLOW.name: REFLEXIVE BLOW
REFLEXIVE BLOW.effect: The Sentinel first attacks the inciting character with Overwatch.

RESTOCK DRONE.name: RESTOCK DRONE
RESTOCK DRONE.effect:
Restock Drone (Size 1/2, HP {5/8/10}, Evasion {10/12/14}, E-Defense {10/12/14}, Tags: Drone)
This drone can be deployed hovering in a space within range 5. The next time an allied character moves through or next to the drone, it clamps on and discharges its reserves, letting them regain {5/10/15} HP.

RETRIBUTION.name: RETRIBUTION
RETRIBUTION.effect: Whenever the Goliath takes damage, their next attack deals +{2/3/4} bonus damage. This bonus stacks up to +8. Bonuses are lost when the Goliath attacks, or at the end of their next turn.

REVENGE.name: REVENGE
REVENGE.effect: 1/scene, if an allied non-Grunt, non-Drone character is destroyed within Range 5, for the rest of the scene the Avenger gains OVERSHIELD {8/12/16}, +5 base damage to its ranged and melee attacks, and +1 Accuracy on all attacks, checks, and saves.

RING OF FIRE.name: RING OF FIRE
RING OF FIRE.effect: Any hostile characters that start their turn inside the area affected by the Defense Net or that enter it for the first time in a round take 2 heat and become Shredded until they leave the area.

SAPPER KIT SWAP BONUS.name: SAPPER KIT SWAP BONUS
SAPPER KIT SWAP BONUS.effect: Swap bonus: The Strider launches a flash grenade at a character within line of sight and Range 5. Their target must pass an AGILITY save or become JAMMED until the end of their next turn.
SAPPER KIT SWAP BONUS.trigger: The Strider swaps to the SAPPER KIT.

SAP.name: SAP
SAP.effect: The Demolisher chooses a character next to them: they must succeed on an Engineering save or be Stunned until the end of their next turn.

SCOURER.name: 清扫器
SCOURER.flavor: Scourer-class mechs are distinctive for carrying deadly Energy damage weapons powered by massive-output recursive power plants. These mechs are found across the galaxy in specialist roles, supporting conventional ground troops with powerful beam attacks that stop electronic threats as easily as they stop enemy soldiers.
SCOURER.tactics: Scourers deal a great deal of damage when they focus on single targets, attacking them multiple times. They can be used to crack tough or slow moving opponents very easily. However, they are much less effective when forced to switch targets, and need to stay still to make the most of their weapons.

SCOUT DRONE.name: 斥候 DRONE
SCOUT DRONE.effect:
Scout Drone (Size 1/2, HP 10, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Drone).
The Mercenary deploys the drone to a free space within Sensors. The drone creates a Burst 2 perimeter, within which characters cannot become Invisible or Hide and lose those conditions if they have them. The Mercenary also gains +1 Accuracy when attacking characters within the affected area. The drone can be deployed to a new location as a protocol.

SCOUT.name: 斥候
SCOUT.flavor: The most devastating mechanized-warfare strategies call for the active, close, and aggressive application of orbital, atmospheric, and terrestrial fire-support. Enter Scout-class mechs and their pilots. Using advanced targeting systems, Scouts are equal parts tactical coordinator and artillery commander, working with allies to map the battlescape and accurately place direct-targeted and autonomous fire.
SCOUT.tactics: Scouts are support mechs designed to increase the damage dealt by their allies. They deal no damage themselves, but Marker Rifle and Cloaking Field allow them to both keep allied characters alive and prevent enemies from hiding. They are especially adept at revealing Invisible characters but need to get close to their targets to take full advantage of this ability. Like most support mechs, Scouts aren’t especially resilient on their own.

Secondary Gunner.name: Secondary Gunner
Secondary Gunner.effect: The MBT may make attacks with its Secondary Weapon even while Jammed or Stunned.

SEEDER.name: 播种机
SEEDER.flavor: Seeder-archetype mechs are sappers, adept at deploying defensive nets of mines and traps. Laden with ordnance and bristling with sensor suites, Seeders operate in small teams: together, they blanket battlefields in traps and pitfalls, planting mines and other area-denial systems to guide the enemy into kill-boxes.
SEEDER.tactics: Seeders specialize in area denial, controlling enemy movement with their mines. Since Seeders can place a mine each turn, they can quickly turn part of the battlefield into a mess when left to their own devices. Allied characters don’t trigger Seeders’ mines, but are affected by them if they’re caught in the explosion. Seeders can take optional systems that force characters to spread out or take additional damage.

SEEKER CLOUD.name: SEEKER CLOUD
SEEKER CLOUD.effect: Characters damaged by this weapon gain Lock On.

SEISMIC DESTROYER.name: SEISMIC DESTROYER
SEISMIC DESTROYER.effect: Unless they can fly, all characters in a Cone 3 or line5 area must succeed on an Agility save or be Stunned until the end of their next turn.

SELF-ERASURE.name: SELF-ERASURE
SELF-ERASURE.effect: When the Operator’s mech is destroyed, it immediately self-immolates in a wave of superheated plasma. All characters adjacent to the Operator when this takes place must succeed on an Agility save or take {4/6/8} Energy damage. On a success, they take half damage. This mech is then removed from the battlefield – it is utterly annihilated.

SELF REPAIR.name: SELF REPAIR
SELF REPAIR.effect: 1/scene, as a Full Action, the Veteran regains all HP and clears all conditions.

SENTINEL.name: 哨兵
SENTINEL.flavor: Sentinel archetypes are typically employed as guards and escorts, often in the retinues of commanders or posted in defense of artillery. These mechs and their pilots employ advanced suites of technology to ensure their wards stay alive and operational, even if that costs their own chassis – or lives. Unlike the heavier Bastion archetypes, Sentinels are quick and light: they practice active defense, preemptively striking with suites of advanced technical, systemic, and direct weaponry to protect their charges.
SENTINEL.tactics: Sentinels are fast defenders that focus on protecting their allies with Overwatch. They are fairly short-range attackers, relying on positioning to get the most from their kit, and aren’t as resilient as other defenders.

Serrated Machete.name: Serrated Machete
Serrated Machete.effect: On critical hit: The target becomes Shredded until the end of their next turn.

SHROUD CHARGE.name: SHROUD CHARGE
SHROUD CHARGE.effect:
The Sniper sets off a charge, creating a Burst 3 area of smoke, haze, or some other kind of concealing shroud. The Sniper gains soft cover within the affected area, and characters other than the Sniper cannot draw line of sight into or out of the area. Characters partially within the area have line of sight to characters within and outside the area.
This effect lasts until the end of the Sniper’s next turn, or until the Sniper uses this system again.

SIEGE ARMOR.name: SIEGE ARMOR
SIEGE ARMOR.effect: The Bombard has Resistance to all damage from attacks that originate beyond range 3.

SIEGE GUARDIAN.name: SIEGE GUARDIAN
SIEGE GUARDIAN.effect: Allied characters gain Resistance to damage from Blast, Burst, Line, and Cone attacks while they’re adjacent to the Bastion.

SKIRMISHER.name: SKIRMISHER
SKIRMISHER.effect: Once per turn, at any point during the Operator’s turn, they may Boost as a free action.

SKIRMISHER KIT SWAP BONUS.name: SKIRMISHER KIT SWAP BONUS
SKIRMISHER KIT SWAP BONUS.effect: Swap bonus: This turn only, the Strider’s movement ignores difficult terrain and engagement, and doesn’t provoke reactions.
SKIRMISHER KIT SWAP BONUS.trigger: The Strider swaps to the SKIRMISHER KIT.

SLIVERSHIELDING.name: SLIVERSHIELDING
SLIVERSHIELDING.effect: This system replaces Resilient. The Ultra becomes permanently Invisible.

SOLDIERS.name: SOLDIERS
SOLDIERS.effect: The Squad acts as one character, but it represents a group of soldiers acting together. When the Squad takes a certain amount of damage, it results in the narrative death of one or more of those soldiers. Eventually, this reduces the number of attacks the Squad can make each turn, as listed in the relevant weapon profiles. By default, the Squad is made up of 10 members, each with 1 HP.

SPECIALIST KIT.name: SPECIALIST KIT
SPECIALIST KIT.effect: The Elite chooses an additional optional system from their class.

SPINED.name: SPINED
SPINED.effect: After the Monstrosity takes damage from a melee weapon, it automatically deals {1/2/3} AP kinetic damage to the attacker.

SPEED DEPLOYER.name: SPEED DEPLOYER
SPEED DEPLOYER.effect: Lay Mines deploys two mines at a time, not one.

SPITE.name: 怨恨者
SPITE.flavor: The Spite is an aggressive tech defender chassis commonly used by HORUS techno cults, pirates, and insurgent factions. By using a reactor-override liturgicode, these mechs are able to pry a mech’s reactor cores open and keep them that way, spiking them with feedback each time a weapon is fired. Unaware or reckless pilots taking the field against an experienced Spite pilot will often find themselves cooking themselves to death.
SPITE.tactics: The Spite punishes characters who rely on heat management or careful heat generation to maximize their damage output. Use IMPRISON to lock down dangerous damage-dealers and ENTHRONE it somewhere it can guard its allies, but be careful – it’s relatively immobile and can’t do much on its own.

SPLINTER ROUNDS.name: SPLINTER ROUNDS
SPLINTER ROUNDS.effect: The Pirate deals +3 bonus damage on critical hits.

SSC TOTAL SUITE.name: SSC TOTAL SUITE
SSC TOTAL SUITE.effect: The Hornet can hover whenever they move or Boost.

STAMPEDE DEFENSE.name: STAMPEDE DEFENSE
STAMPEDE DEFENSE.effect: The Berserker has Resistance to all damage unless they are Impaired, Stunned, Immobilized, Shredded, Slowed or Exposed.

Stable Body.name: Stable Body
Stable Body.effect: The MBT can't be pushed, pulled, or knocked back by smaller characters. If a hostile effect would move the MBT 2 or more spaces or knock it Prone (even if the MBT would ignore that effect due to Immunity or movement caused by a smaller character) that character may change which side its armored facing is on after that effect resolves. Characters may also Ram the MBT to change which side its armored facing is on regardless of their Size.

STEEL JAW.name: STEEL JAW
STEEL JAW.effect: Auxiliary weapons can’t do more than 1 damage to the Veteran.

STEP.name: STEP
STEP.effect: The Operator teleports to a free space within line of sight and range 50.

SUPERIOR TARGETING.name: SUPERIOR TARGETING
SUPERIOR TARGETING.effect: The Ultra ignores cover when making ranged attacks.

Supernova.name: Supernova
Supernova.effect:
Trigger: A hostile character causes a Grapple involving the Leech to end.

Effect: Before the grapple ends, the grappled character takes 4/5/6 Burn.

SUPERSONIC.name: SUPERSONIC
SUPERSONIC.effect: The Hornet flies to a space in line of sight and range 50 so impossibly fast that it counts as teleportation.

SUPPRESS.name: SUPPRESS
SUPPRESS.effect:
The Archer chooses a target within line of sight and Range 10: they become Impaired and the Archer gains the Moving Target reaction.
This effect lasts until the Archer uses Moving Target; the target damages the Archer or leaves the Archer’s line of sight; the Archer is Stunned, Jammed, or destroyed; the Archer chooses a new target for this action; or, the Archer ends it as a free action.

SUPREME MAINTENANCE.name: SUPREME MAINTENANCE
SUPREME MAINTENANCE.effect: The Ultra gains Immunity to Jammed; additionally, the Ultra can reload one Loading weapon as a free action on their turn and can repair a destroyed weapon or system as a quick action.

SUPREME MELEE.name: SUPREME MELEE
SUPREME MELEE.effect: The Ultra gains +1 Accuracy on all melee attacks; additionally, once on their turn, the Ultra can Grapple, Ram, or make a melee attack as a free action.

TEMPERED HIDE.name: TEMPERED HIDE
TEMPERED HIDE.effect: The Monstrosity gains Resistance to any two of the following damage types: kinetic damage, Energy damage, and Explosive damage. If it is reduced to half of its total HP or less, it loses this Resistance. If it has any Structure, it regains Resistance when its HP returns to full.

THERMAL CHARGE.name: THERMAL CHARGE
THERMAL CHARGE.effect: The Breacher may expend a charge to throw a grenade to a space within range 5. Characters in the ensuing Blast 2 explosion take {2/4/6} Burn if they fail an Agility save, half on a success. Objects, terrain, and Deployables take {10/20/30} AP kinetic damage.

UNSHIELDED REACTOR.name: UNSHIELDED REACTOR
UNSHIELDED REACTOR.effect: Characters that start their turn adjacent to the Pyro or become adjacent to the Pyro for the first time on their turn take {2/3/4} Heat.

UNSTOPPABLE.name: UNSTOPPABLE
UNSTOPPABLE.effect: The Ultra gains Immunity to all involuntary movement, including Knockback and Prone.

VEHICLE.name: 载具
VEHICLE.description:
Despite the prevalence of mechs, the majority of armored combat, transport, scouting, and myriad other civilian and military tasks falls to the humble tracked or wheeled vehicle. Powered by fusion, internal combustion, electricity, hydrogen, wind, people, paracausal engines, or something even more unusual, vehicles can carry people, mount weapons, be girded in armor, or otherwise accomplish quickly the simple tasks for which they were designed: moving people and things quickly and in good condition from point A to point B.
This template can be applied to any Mech NPC. They lose the Mech tag and become a Vehicle instead.

VETERANCY.name: VETERANCY
VETERANCY.effect: The Veteran gains +1 Accuracy on all checks and saves for one mech skill (chosen at creation): Hull, Agility, Systems, or Engineering.

VETERAN.name: 老兵
VETERAN.description:
Veterans are hardened, experienced fighters that have survived several direct engagements. This isn’t their first rodeo, and their ability to withstand morale shocks is far higher than an untested greenhorn. Their value on the field is the experience they bring to a deployment and their steady presence along the line.
Use the Veteran template to make more memorable characters.

VETERAN TRAITS.name: VETERAN TRAITS
VETERAN TRAITS.effect: The Veteran gains one Veteran Trait per tier.

VOLLEY MODULE.name: VOLLEY MODULE
VOLLEY MODULE.effect:
The Ultra adopts a stable stance and prepares one of their weapons. On their next turn, as a protocol, the Ultra uses the prepared weapon to attack any number of characters, as long as they are within Range, and aren’t in cover or Prone. All characters are aware of this attack and can choose to drop Prone as a free action on their turn to avoid being targeted.
The Ultra can attack unlimited times with the prepared weapon as part of this effect, even if it’s Loading.

WARP SENSORS.name: WARP SENSORS
WARP SENSORS.effect: The Mirage makes a tech attack against a target within Sensors. On a success, they take {2/3/4} Heat and all attacks they make until the end of their next turn treat their targets as having soft cover.

WARP TARGETING.name: WARP TARGETING
WARP TARGETING.effect: All allied characters within range 50 benefit from soft cover. If the Mirage takes damage, this effect ends until the start of their next turn.

WATCHFUL GUARDIAN.name: WATCHFUL GUARDIAN
WATCHFUL GUARDIAN.effect: Allied characters that benefit from the cover provided by the Goliath gain Resistance to all damage.

WRATH-LOCK.name: WRATH-LOCK
WRATH-LOCK.effect: The Sentinel arms this system. Once armed, the Sentinel attacks twice the next time they attack with their Combat Shotgun, instead of one.

WOLFHOUND MISSILE.name: WOLFHOUND MISSILE
WOLFHOUND MISSILE.effect:
Wolfhound Missile (Size 1, HP {10/15/20}, Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, Tags: Drone)
The Ultra chooses a character within line of sight and range 30, then deploys the wolfhound missile to an adjacent space. At the start of each of the Ultra’s subsequent turns, the missile flies 3 spaces towards the target, or 6 spaces if the target has Lock On. The missile moves as directly as possible, but maneuvers around cover and obstructions as long as there is space to do so. When the missile collides with a character or reaches the target, it detonates with a Blast 1 explosion. Characters within the affected area must make an Agility save. On fail, they take {14/20/28} Energy damage; on a success, they take half damage.
The Ultra can only deploy one wolfhound missile at a time, and this system can only recharge once the missile has detonated.

Wrecker.name: Wrecker
Wrecker.effect: Whenever this weapon is used to attack it attacks all characters within Threat.

XENOTECH.name: XENOTECH
XENOTECH.effect: Scan doesn’t reveal any information about Exotic Systems.

\"Streetsweeper\" Canister Projector.name: "Streetsweeper" Canister Projector
\"Streetsweeper\" Canister Projector.effect: This attack's Cone area cannot change directions when fired.
